channel.title: [FoL] Forum of Lies 24 - Night 3 (11/16) - Completed - The Unseen and the Warlock Win!
channel.description:
![Tol-redBanner2-skinny|690x249](upload://skO2hDwrPxkveOMQeZMyq9VpEfj.png) ###
hosted by Geyde and Maxwell and Emilia (Hja)
## Rules 1. Follow the Global Forum Rules 2. Follow the Official(tm) Forum(tm) Mafia(tm) and(tm) Forum(tm) of(tm) Lies(tm) Rules(tm) by Luxy the Moderator 2. If you haven’t posted content in 36 hours, you’ll be prodded for inactivity. If you don’t respond to that prod in 12 hours, you will be force replaced. 3. No private messaging others in the game about the game. 4. Do not quote private host messages. *This includes copypasting* 5. Don’t throw the game. This includes any form of intent to make you or your faction lose. 6. Refrain from spamposting. 7. Players are not allowed to use big letters. These are reserved for the host. 8. You are allowed to leave the game but doing it will net you a temporary blacklist meaning you can’t join a forum of lies for a while. Further leaving may net with a permanent blacklist 9. Lets all have fun and play together! 10. Do not edit or delete made posts. 11. Do not like posts in the thread when you would not be able to speak in there normally. ## Gameplay * Days last 48 hours, or until a majority is reached for execution. Nights last 24 hours. The first day will last for 24 hours. * All actions must be sent to the mod. * Unseen/Cult will talk through a special Discord server or forum message. * The priest will speak with the dead through a separate Discord server or forum message. * All classes will be used and will be used as they are found in the Class Cards Thread. * Recently changed classes will *NOT* be forcibly rolled and are not guaranteed unless stated. ## Executions * To accuse someone say “/accuse [player]” or “/vote [player]” * Should the votes reach the majority, that player will be executed and the day will end. * When the day ends, the player with the most votes will be executed. * No Lynch may be done by saying "/vote no lynch". This will stop the end of day plurality lynch from happening should it have more votes than any player. ## Picking a New King * If there are less than 4 players a new king will not be selected. * When the king dies a 12 hour period starts. In this, players may vote in their class PM for who they want to become the next king. * Whoever receives the most votes in this period will be crowned king. If votes are tied, a king election will be held the next day to determine it. ## Action Results ## [Feedback List ](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/forum-of-lies-hosting-feedback-guide/75082) ## Journals * PM the host what you want on your journal. When you die, the last update to your journal will be revealed to everyone ## Classlist **King** **(65% Good, 35% Evil / Devout)** **Mastermind**/**Cult Leader** **Assassin**/**Random Cult** **Prince** **Random Blue Dragon** **Random Blue Dragon** **Random Blue Dragon** **Random Blue Dragon** **Random Blue Dragon** **Random Blue Dragon** **Random Blue Dragon** **Random Blue Dragon** **Random Blue Dragon** **Random Blue Dragon** / **Random Neutral Non-Killer** **Random Neutral Non-Killer** **Neutral Killer** ## [Classes ](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/fol-class-cards-now-officially-official/1998) ## Playerlist 1. Jgoesgaming 2. WazzaAzza :crown: 3. AlexejheroYTB 4. Frostwolf103 5. ~~Vulgard~~ [color=steblue]**The Observer**[/color] 6. Shurian 7. SirDerpsAlot 8. PoisonedSquid 9. Marshal 10. Katze 11. Arete 12. Possessed 13. JaketheWolfie 14. ~~Sam17z~~ [color=steblue]**The Butler**[/color] 15. Kai_5 16. Luxy ### Backups: 1. DatBird 2. Napoleon ### Thread Summary [Day 2 Start](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/fol-forum-of-lies-24-day-2-15-16-vulgard-is-vulgone/79435/855?u=geyde) # New player guide: [details="Details"] Always ask the hosts when in doubt. We don’t mind if we get 20 mechanical questions a day from you to ensure that you understand how the game works. Read the original post carefully as many questions are already answered in there. [FoL Class Cards (Now Officially Official) ](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/fol-class-cards-now-officially-official/1998) is where all the classcards are that are possible. There are definite deviations from Throne of Lies the game, although many many similarities persist. We have even completely new classes like Priest, Archer, Demon etc., so be sure to look at this link carefully. Small deviations for existing classes exist as well to provide a more forum balanced game. An example is that a Knight can Cold Steel Night 1 already and a Physician’s Exhume only provides the faction of the dead person’s killer instead of the whole class. Examples are that mainly investigative classes gain feedback. A butler occupying another player will not see if they are occupy immune or not. The player being occupied will not see that they are being occupied by anyone unless they are an investigative. Another example is that a Physician will not know whether their target was bleeding/poisoned and the target player will not know whether they are healed. Trials also do not exist similar to Throne of Lies. That means when someone is “voted up”, they are immediately executed once majority is reached, so ensure that you stand behind your vote! Forum players use a specific lingo and some common abbreviations can be found in the following link: https://wiki.mafiascum.net/index.php?title=Commonly_Used_Abbreviations Remember, when in doubt, ask the hosts in your classcard. [/details]

item.title: [FoL] Forum of Lies 24 - Night 3 (11/16) - Completed - The Unseen and the Warlock Win!
item.dc:creator: Geyde
item.description:
Arete:

1-3 players

If it’s 1 player all players in the chat are conversion and death immune for the night
If it’s 2 players all players in the chat are … I’m not sure
If it’s 3 players there’s no special benefit

Thing is
You do 3 players early on no matter what then do 1 in the late game no matter what

Read full topic

item.title: [FoL] Forum of Lies 24 - Night 3 (11/16) - Completed - The Unseen and the Warlock Win!
item.dc:creator: Arete
item.description:
I think the biggest thing I would encourage you to do is to be more active in specifically pushing agenda

There wasn’t really a point at which you were pushing a mislynch, which (while the D2 mislynch was basically free) is something you can potentially improve on in the future

Basically, there were various places where you had good content but you didn’t go anywhere with it

also distance less

Read full topic

item.description:
Yeah I know, that’s why it doesn’t make sense to me, there is evidence he can’t be starting scum whether he is MM or Assassin.

For some reason I had Eureka moment and I begin to understand Derps, but of course I went back and voted Alexej again with this half mis-guided plan.

Read full topic

item.description:
On another topic

…I feel like the thing where Jgoes has yet to have a groupscum game is making it hard to read him

Obviously meta-reads aren’t the be-all and end-all of reads but it would help if I had any idea what his wolfrange is

Was it better/worse than you expected it to be?

What can I improve about it?

Read full topic
